replies.msg:
Jürgen Klopp 'couldn't be happier' with what Liverpool have achieved during their stay in Austria as their training camp draws to a conclusion.

"It is one of the best camps we ever had – and nobody would have thought that a few days ago. It is absolutely great." #lfclive [lfc]

Klopp on Salzburg: “We will give some players a few more minutes so we can get closer to the 90, but I’ve said before, we cannot do less now because we play the game on Saturday; we have to prepare for a full season." #lfclive

Klopp: “We land on Tuesday night, Wednesday we will be off and then from Thursday onwards it will be pure preparation for Arsenal with two sessions. We have to work on set-pieces, we have to do the analysis – whatever we can use. It will be a busy day, but all OK.” #lfclive
